      • getDebugDirectory

        @Slow(value=MILLISECONDS)
 @CheckResult
 @Nullable
public static java.io.File getDebugDirectory(@NonNull
                                                                                                android.content.Context context)
        Returns the directory with respect to the application's external storage where debug files are stored.
        Parameters:
        context - The Android application context.
        Returns:
        A File object pointing to the debug directory or null if it was unable to be created.

      • getFirmwareUpdateType

        @NonNull
public static FirmwareUtils.UpdateType getFirmwareUpdateType(@NonNull
                                                                      android.content.Context context,
                                                                      @Nullable
                                                                      WearableToken wearableToken,
                                                                      @Nullable
                                                                      java.lang.String firmwareVersion,
                                                                      @Nullable
                                                                      FirmwareLanguage firmwareLanguage)
        Checks firmware update availability and returns type of firmware update. It takes wearable type into account. For WearableProductCode.PHONE is firmware update never available.
        Parameters:
        context - Context instance.
        wearableToken - Wearable token for the paired device.
        firmwareVersion - Version of latest firmware.
        firmwareLanguage - Language of latest firmware.
        Returns:
        Type of firmware update.

      • isMandatoryFirmwareUpdateAvailable

        public static boolean isMandatoryFirmwareUpdateAvailable(@NonNull
                                                         android.content.Context context,
                                                         @Nullable
                                                         WearableToken wearableToken)
        Checks if a mandatory firmware update is available.
        Parameters:
        context - Context instance.
        wearableToken - Wearable token for the paired device.
        Returns:
        True if a mandatory firmware update is available.
